column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I think Lou's is great deep dish pizza
column2: but I've kind of grown sick of it. Just one piece is so filling
column3: and the tomato-cheese style isn't that good to me anymore. The butter crust is excellent
column4: though. I just prefer a bit more actual tomato sauce
column5: and this is more about the cheese. However
column6: the thin crust is good too. They have a great Lou's salad too- the dressing is awesome!
